changeSet.author: Jan-Willem Gmelig Meyling
changeSet.sql: insert into course (id, code, name) select id, code, name from course_edition; update course_edition set course_id = id;
insert into repository (id, DTYPE, repository_name, build_instruction) select id, 1 as DTYPE, repository_name, build_instruction from groups; update groups set repository_id = id;
update assignment_deliveries set group_number = (select group_number from groups where groups.id = assignment_deliveries.group_id);

insert into commit (repository_id, commit_id) select build_results.repository_id, build_results.commit_id from build_results where not exists ( select * from commit where commit.repository_id = build_results.repository_id and commit.commit_id = build_results.commit_id);

insert into commit (repository_id, commit_id) select pull_requests.repository_id, pull_requests.merge_commit_id as commit_id from pull_requests where not exists ( select * from commit where commit.repository_id = pull_requests.repository_id and commit.commit_id = pull_requests.merge_commit_id);

insert into commit (repository_id, commit_id) select pull_requests.repository_id, pull_requests.destination_commit_id as commit_id from pull_requests where not exists ( select * from commit where commit.repository_id = pull_requests.repository_id and commit.commit_id = pull_requests.destination_commit_id);

insert into commit (repository_id, commit_id) select assignment_deliveries.repository_id, assignment_deliveries.commit_id from assignment_deliveries where not exists ( select * from commit where commit.repository_id = assignment_deliveries.repository_id and commit.commit_id = assignment_deliveries.commit_id);
update group_memberships set course_edition_id = (select course_edition_id from groups where groups.id = group_memberships.group_id);
update group_memberships set group_number = (select group_number from groups where groups.id = group_memberships.group_id);
insert into seq_group_number (course_edition_id, next_val) select course_edition_id, (MAX(group_number) + 1) as next_val from groups group by course_edition_id;
insert into seq_issue_id (repository_id, next_val) select repository_id, (MAX(issue_id) + 1) as next_val from pull_requests group by repository_id;
insert into seq_assignment_id (course_edition_id, next_val) select course_edition_id, (MAX(assignment_id) + 1) as next_val from assignments group by course_edition_id;

changeSet.author: Jan-Willem Gmelig Meyling
changeSet.sql: insert into delivery_students (delivery_id, user_id ) select assignment_deliveries.id as delivery_id, group_memberships.user_id as user_id from assignment_deliveries join group_memberships on group_memberships.course_edition_id = assignment_deliveries.course_edition_id and group_memberships.group_number = assignment_deliveries.group_number;

changeSet.author: Jan-Willem Gmelig Meyling
changeSet.sql: insert into pull_requests (repository_id, issue_id, open, created_date, closed_date, title, description, assignee) select repository_id, issue_id, open, created_date, closed_date, title, description, assignee from repository_issues;
insert into pull_request_comments (issue_id, repository_id, content, user_id, created_date) select issue_id, repository_id, content, user_id, created_date from repository_issue_comments;
